prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with green skin and large wings that resemble a dragonfly.
Show me a fierce-looking Pokemon that combines speed and agility with sharp claws.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in forest environments and has a camouflaging ability.
Design a Pokemon with a sleek, aerodynamic body designed for high-speed aerial attacks.
Generate a Pokemon that is known for its swift movements and stealthy hunting techniques.

Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a predatory insect, with vibrant colors.

distinctive_features: Wings resembling those of a mantis
